reviews.review_msg: Yeah so this dude doesn't care about students learning. He wants the grades to take a specific shape and as a stats prof he'll give whatever he wants in exams. There's no reason for students to do long calculator operations to get the mean, std deviation etc but when u want a low average cuz the midterm was too easy you have to do such things.

Avoid at all costs. Dodges in class questions. Textbook is basically a book of lecture notes, riddled with errors and typos. End of chapter exercises (about 30) only have 2-4 solutions. Questions aren't taken up or solutions provided. Leaves you feeling aimless in an already difficult course. TAs grade all or nothing, no part marks. Equally useless
